description:
Kagura has gotten fat because of her recent degenerate lifestyle. She goes to Otae for advice, but Otae has also gotten fat from eating too much ice cream. Satchan laughs at the both of them for becoming fat, but she has also gotten fat… The three spurred to do something about their situation. They join a famous fasting dojo in town. There they run into Otose, Catherine, and even Kyubei…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You Want to Slim Down, Go and Exercise, Do Not Eat
Ihr wollt abnehmen? Dann bewegt euch und hört auf zu essen!
やせたいなら動け 食べるな
